job_title: Domestic Cleaning Service\building Maintains in Malton, England
pros: getting out and creating a life not just for yourself but for other people as well, i like my community and the people in it, as a signal dad bringing my 5 year old girl up getting out and working is a break in a nice way : )
cons: the down falls of working for myself are i have no transport so i walk around with my window cleaning equipment, am also restricted with my girl and working around her school hour and  the weather  can stop me, but got to keep pushing

review_title: Worst Company I ever worked for
job_title: Lead PMO Manager in Blairgowrie, Scotland
pros: None, local, friendly staff, right on the river
cons: No sick pay only statutory, standard 20 days holiday, 6 months probation, no benefits, staff bullied and forced to accept unacceptable work patterns and contracts, no direction and most staff sacked within 12 weeks, no performance management

job_title: Front of House in Edinburgh, Scotland
pros: Good money because of a lot of hours
cons: Late hours finished, no social life
